title: LSU Health Shreveport - Teach. Heal. Discover.
description: As one of only one hundred forty academic medical centers (AMC) in the nation, LSU Health Shreveport is a revered treasure. Our medical schools are educating and training the next generation of health care professionals and scientists who will continue our proud legacy of innovative and lifesaving healthcare and cutting-edge medical research.
cleaned_text: The LSU Health Shreveport Foundation returned with its annual fundraising event, An Evening for Healers, on Thursday, August 31. For 12 years, the event has served as a platform to honor and celebrate the Shreveport-Bossier community's first responders, physicians, nurses, allied health professionals, and other healthcare providers.
